TopicTitle: Ejection seat mod, help to make it better?

Articles.Content:
I built some parts that allow ejection seats to be constructed. The seat acts as a control module and below that theres a decoupler, that detaches the seat from rest of the airplane. Two small rockets can be attached to the seat as well. The problem is that it is quite hard to attach the seat and the decoupler to the cockpit, If you know how to make it better I would appreciate it, I would also like to use the kerbal models as a part of the seat if that is possible. Its somewhat usable at the moment.
